Body: Possible Duplicate:  Is it possible to send a file wirelessly without bluetooth or a wifi network in ICS?  I recently asked the question whether it was possible to transfer 2 files between two ICS devices here.This leads to the question:  How do I transfer files between two ICS-devices using WiFi Direct?  Is there a way to do it built-in to ICS, or is there an app for it?UPDATE:The Samsung Galaxy S II apparently has this feature built in pre-ICS (go samsung!). Is this same method available in ICS?
Title: How to transfer files using WiFi Direct between 2 ICS devices?

history.Text: I recently asked the question whether it was *possible* to transfer 2 files between two ICS devices [here][1].This leads to the question:  **How do I transfer files between two ICS-devices using WiFi Direct?**  Is there a way to do it built-in to ICS, or is there an app for it?  [1]: http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/19985/is-it-possible-to-send-a-file-wirelessly-without-bluetooth-or-a-wifi-network-in/19986#19986
How to transfer files using WiFi Direct between 2 ICS devices?

I recently asked the question whether it was *possible* to transfer 2 files between two ICS devices [here][1].This leads to the question:  **How do I transfer files between two ICS-devices using WiFi Direct?**  Is there a way to do it built-in to ICS, or is there an app for it?**UPDATE:**The Samsung Galaxy S II apparently has this feature [built in][2] pre-ICS (go samsung!). Is this same method available in ICS?  [1]: http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/19985/is-it-possible-to-send-a-file-wirelessly-without-bluetooth-or-a-wifi-network-in/19986#19986  [2]: http://androidadvices.com/galaxy-s2-wifi-direct-feature-high-speed-data-transfer/

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [Is it possible to send a file wirelessly without bluetooth or a wifi network in ICS?](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/19985/is-it-possible-to-send-a-file-wirelessly-without-bluetooth-or-a-wifi-network-in)  I recently asked the question whether it was *possible* to transfer 2 files between two ICS devices [here][1].This leads to the question:  **How do I transfer files between two ICS-devices using WiFi Direct?**  Is there a way to do it built-in to ICS, or is there an app for it?**UPDATE:**The Samsung Galaxy S II apparently has this feature [built in][2] pre-ICS (go samsung!). Is this same method available in ICS?  [1]: http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/19985/is-it-possible-to-send-a-file-wirelessly-without-bluetooth-or-a-wifi-network-in/19986#19986  [2]: http://androidadvices.com/galaxy-s2-wifi-direct-feature-high-speed-data-transfer/
